Question
========
A social science researcher cycles 20 kilometers to work every day. For six months, she measures the time it takes her to get to work and finds that it varies quite a bit. She thinks she can predict her daily arrival time by measuring the temperature in degrees, determining the wind strength, and determining the wind direction (up or down). Which analysis does the researcher choose?


  
Answerlist
----------
* ANOVA for repeated measures
* ANCOVA
* Multiple regression analysis with a dummy
* Two-way ANOVA
